device_overview.title: Data sources
device_overview.toast_message: Disabled data source. First activate other data sources.

device_list.empty_collection: No items found for this campaign or there is no internet/Wi-Fi.

explanation_sheet.title: Brief explanation
explanation_sheet.description:
This screen lists data sources to activate: install devices, grant access to online sources, and answer questions.

Green sources are activated, gray ones become enabled after one or more white ones are activated.

Select the green ?-icon at the bottom right to view again.

status_indicator.error: An error occurred while activating the measurement device. Please try again.

alert.unknown_error: An error occurred while activating the device.
alert.already_activated: This measurement device was already activated on another account.
alert.mismatched_device_name: The wrong device has been scanned. Please try again with the correct device.

already_invited.title: Already invited
already_invited.description: The invitation email you received contains an activation link. Click on this link to start installing your measuring devices.

status_indicator.error: An error occurred while loading device information. Scan the QR code again.

alert.unknown_error: An error occurred while connecting to the measurement device.
alert.timeout: The device could not be connected. Please restart the app!

authenticated.title: Scan a QR code
authenticated.description: Scan the QR code of a measurement device. It can be found on the e-ink screen or on a sticker on the device.

unauthenticated.title: NeedForHeat
unauthenticated.subtitle: App for participants in a study of Research Group Energy Transition of Windesheim University of Applied Sciences
unauthenticated.description: You can only use this app after receiving an invitation for a study with a personal activation link.

success.title: Device connected successfully
success.message: The measurement device was connected and the research server received data from it on {{date}}.

provisioning_error.title: An error occurred
provisioning_error.message: An error occurred while configuring your device. Restart the measurement device and try again.

wifi_error.title: Something went wrong while connecting the Wi-Fi network
wifi_error.message: Please make sure the password is correct and you are in proximity of the device.

measurements_error.title: No data was received
measurements_error.message: After a long period, no data was received from the device.

errors.invalid_qr: The QR code is not a valid QR code for a measurement device.
errors.mismatched_device_name: You are scanning the wrong device. Please scan again with the right one.
errors.unknown_error: An error occurred while scanning the QR code.
errors.camera_request_failed: An error occurred while requesting camera permissions.

alert.title: Camera permission
alert.message:
This app uses the camera to scan QR codes from the device.

Do you want to grant this permission?

bluetooth.request_failed: An error occurred while requesting Bluetooth permissions.
bluetooth.enable_failed: An error occurred while enabling Bluetooth.

bluetooth.enabling: Bluetooth is currently disabled. To proceed, please enable your Bluetooth.

alert.title: Allow permissions
alert.androidmessage:
To connect to the module, this app requires Bluetooth, Precise Location, and Nearby Devices permissions.

You will be prompted to enable these permissions when necessary.
alert.iosmessage:
To establish a connection with the module, this app utilizes Bluetooth.

You will be prompted to enable Bluetooth when necessary.
alert.disabled_bluetooth: Bluetooth is disabled. Do you want to enable Bluetooth?

error.title: An error occurred.
error.message: Please make sure Bluetooth is enabled and try again.

not_found.title: Device {{name}} was not found.
not_found.message: Please make sure that the measurement device is nearby your smartphone. Try searching again with the button below.

status_indicator.unexpected_loading: Loading Wi-Fi networks is taking longer than expected, please wait...
status_indicator.error: An error has occurred while loading Wi-Fi networks.

fetch_error.title: Error
fetch_error.message: An error occurred while loading Wi-Fi networks. The connection to the device might have been lost.

known_network.title: Use stored password?
known_network.message: Do you want to use the password stored previously for this network {{name}}?

password.title: Password
password.message: Enter the password for the network

hidden_wifi.title: Error
hidden_wifi.message: Cannot connect to hidden Wi-Fi networks

invalid_wifi.title: Error
invalid_wifi.message: This measurement device cannot connect to WPA2 Enterprise or WPA3 networks.

homeselect_screen.title: Select your Home
homeselect_screen.subtitle: Drag and zoom the map to place the pin on your home

homeaddress_screen.title: Fill in your address
homeaddress_screen.subtitle: Drag and zoom the map to place the pin on your home or edit the address.

error.title: Incorrect address
error.message:
This does not seem a valid address.
Please try again. Check the manual or FAQ for more info.

weather_location_result_screen.title: Weather zone to send
weather_location_result_screen.subtitle: Is your home located in this weather zone?

fail.title: Fail!
fail.message: An error occured while sending the zone:

weather_location_posted_screen.title: Weather Zone Sent
weather_location_posted_screen.subtitle: You sent this weather zone at

alert.title: Location Permission
alert.message:
This app uses GPS to get your location.

Do you want to grant this permission?

errors.request_failed: An error occurred while requesting Location permissions.

initial_data.title: Fetching initial data...
initial_data.message: Retrieving initial data about your home

data.title: Fetching data...
data.message: Retrieving more data about your home

success.title: Success!
success.message: Your building energy profile was sent

api.message: Error fetching keys. Ensure you have internet/Wi-Fi or contact support.

bag.message: Error fetching initial data. Ensure you have internet/Wi-Fi or contact support.

3dbag.message: Error fetching data. Ensure you have internet/Wi-Fi or contact support.

calculating.message: Error calculating data. Try again or contact support.

sending.message: Error sending data. Ensure you have internet/Wi-Fi or contact support.

wifi_passwords.title: Delete stored Wi-Fi passwords
wifi_passwords.message: Are you sure? After removing the stored Wi-Fi passwords from this app, you will have to enter the password again when you want to add a new measurement device.

session_token.title: Reset session token
session_token.message: Are you sure? This is a debug feature. After the reset, you need to re-activate the app using a personal invitation link.

bluetooth_permission.not_granted_ios: Bluetooth permission is not granted. Please grant the permission and try again.
bluetooth_permission.not_granted_android:
Make sure Bluetooth is turned on and that you grant permissions for Precise Location and Nearby Devices.
You can do this through settings.

camera_permission.not_granted_ios: Camera permission is not granted. Please grant the permission and try again.
camera_permission.not_granted_android:
Make sure Camera is turned on.
You can do this through settings.

location_permission.not_granted_ios: Location permission is not granted. Please grant the permission and try again.
location_permission.not_granted_android:
Make sure the Location permission is granted.
You can do this through settings.

external_links.not_supported: Your device does not support opening external links.

confirmation.title: Open external link
confirmation.description:
You are going to open a link outside the application, are you sure?

URL: {{url}}

activate.title: Activating account
activate.message: Please wait while your account is being activated.

notifications.bigText: One or more data sources are offline due to no uploads for a while. Please investigate.
notifications.title: Data source alert
notifications.message: One or more data sources are offline due to no uploads for a while. Please investigate.

alert.title: Notification permission
alert.message:
This app needs notifications to alert you if a data source stops uploading.

Grant permission?

manual_content.error: The manual could not be loaded. Contact the device manufacturer for more information or continue at your own risk.

status_indicator.loading:
Loading...
Please make sure you have an internet connection available.
